favicon.label: Favicon
favicon.desc: A shortcut icon usually displayed on tabs, address bars and bookmarks of most browsers.

meta.label: Header
meta.desc: Header section contains the brand logo/name and navigation links at top of the page.

logo.label: Brand logo
logo.desc: A logo to identify your company, product or service to display in the header section.

use_logo.label: Use brand logo
use_logo.desc: Whether to show your brand logo in the header. If No, just the brand name will be displayed.

title.label: Brand name
title.desc: If you're not using your brand's logo, we recommend you to enter the name of your company here.

url.label: Landing page URL
url.desc: Please provide the URL for a webpage (ex: homepage) where you would want your users to be directed if they click on your logo.

title_color.label: Text color
title_color.desc: Choose a text color for the brand name, it will also be used for the account menu in the customer portal.

center_logo.label: Center aligned brand Logo
center_logo.desc: If you choose 'No' as an option, the logo would be left aligned in the header section.

background_image.label: Background image
background_image.desc: Note: Background image is magnified only during preview mode.

tile_background_image.label: Tile background image
tile_background_image.desc: If yes, the image will be tiled across the page, otherwise it will be filled.

overlay_background_image.label: Overlay background image
overlay_background_image.desc: Overlapping elements on a webpage can help highlight, prompt, and give priority to important content on your page.

meta.label: Typography
meta.desc: Fonts for the text content in the page. If you use typekit for your fonts, ensure you configure the typekit id in Common Settings and configure the fonts here.

google_font.label: Import google font
google_font.desc: You can import multiple fonts from Google. For example, to request the fonts Roboto, Raleway, and Lato, use: Roboto|Raleway|Lato

body.label: Body text font
body.desc: Font used for all the text content on the hosted page.

heading.label: Heading text font
heading.desc: Font used for the all the headings on the hosted page.

title.label: Brand name text font
title.desc: Font used for the brand name in the header section.

meta.label: Text Colors
meta.desc: Color for the texts displayed in the various body section.

text_color.label: Text color
text_color.desc: Color of the shown elsewhere in the body.

heading_text_color.label: Heading text color
heading_text_color.desc: Color of the headings elsewhere in the body.

field_label_color.label: Field label text color
field_label_color.desc: The label which are used in forms.

meta.label: Input Fields
meta.desc: All the fields used to collect input from users.

meta.label: Buttons
meta.desc: Configure the colors for the buttons and button text.

primary_text_color.label: Primary text color
primary_text_color.desc: Primary refers to the Subscribe, Update Card, Login and Update Details buttons that appear on the checkout, update card and customer portal pages.

default_text_color.label: Secondary text color
default_text_color.desc: Secondary refers to the Apply Coupon and Validate VAT number buttons that appear on the sign up page.

danger_text_color.label: Critical action text color
danger_text_color.desc: Critical button refers to canel subscription on customer portal pages.

meta.label: Sections
meta.desc: Groups the content inside it such as order summary, account information, card information, portal etc. Customize the look of these sections.

meta.label: Checkout Page
meta.desc: Customize the elements that are specific to your checkout page.

page_title.label: Page title
page_title.desc: The name of your hosted checkout page that appears at the top of your browser tab.

meta.label: Thank You
meta.desc: Customize the elements that are specific to the thank page.

page_title.label: Page title
page_title.desc: The name of your thank page that appears at the top of your browser tab.

meta.label: Add/Update Card Page
meta.desc: Customize the elements that are specific to the add/update card page.

page_title.label: Page title
page_title.desc: The name of your hosted add/update card page that appears at the top of your browser tab.

meta.label: Customer Portal
meta.desc: Customize the elements that are specific to the customer portal.

page_title.label: Page title
page_title.desc: The name of your portal page that appears at the top of your browser tab.

apple_touch_icon.label: Apple touch icon
apple_touch_icon.desc: Assign a Webpage icon to your customer portal, for customers who use iOS devices.

account.label: Account dropdown menu - value(px)
account.desc: Account dropdown menu can be aligned from the top by assigning a relevant value. Please assign a single value for the margin-top property, for ex: 10px

header_text_color.label: Progress bar text color
header_text_color.desc: It appers in the change subscription section.

meta.label: Subscription Status
meta.desc: Customize the appearance of the susbscription status(trial, active etc.) badge shown in the customer portal.

meta.label: Customer Portal Alerts
meta.desc: Customize the appearance of the info and warning alerts containers.

use_border.label: Show border
use_border.desc: Whether to show border for the alert in portal pages.

meta.label: IFrame
meta.desc: Styles specific for the iframe embedded checkout and card hosted pages. For API use only.

center.label: Align center
center.desc: Specify whether to align the hosted page at center in the inside the iframe or not.

border_color.label: Border color
border_color.desc: Border color for the iframe embed hosted page.

use_border.label: Show border
use_border.desc: Whether to show border for the iframe embed hosted page.
